about_the_game:
Blood on the Elves

From Grace to Vengeance - A Tale of Hybrid Royalty

Experience the harrowing tale of Aileron, the high Elven prince, whose crowning day turns into a nightmare of betrayal and loss. Thrust into exile for his 'unclean' blood, Aileron must navigate the treacherous lands beneath Solaris, forging alliances and mastering his hybrid Elven-vampiric powers to reclaim his honor, his crown, and avenge his family.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Story: Follow Aileron's journey from grace to darkness, through the Elven high kingdom of Solaris to the shadowy realms below, as he confronts his fate and the prejudices of his world.

  • Unique Combat System: Engage in fluid, dynamic combat with a blend of melee, archery, and spell-casting. Utilize three distinct ability sets as you level up, plus special vampire transformations like turning into a bat ('B' key) or executing a vampire dash (hold space bar). All controls are customizable.

  • Vast Exploration: Traverse multiple biomes ranging from the volcanic landscapes to snowy caverns, swamps, and rivers across three kingdoms. Encounter bosses, engage with random events, and discover hidden treasures in the expansive map beneath Solaris.

  • Diverse Enemies: Battle an array of foes including orcs, trolls, witches, tigers, crocodiles, wolves, vampires, and even dragons, each requiring a different strategy to defeat.

  • Alliance Building: Forge or force alliances to build an army capable of storming the fortified city of Solaris to retake the crown.

Current State:

  • As we enter Early Access, players can experience:

  • The initial chapters of Aileron's story in Solaris and the lands below.

  • Core gameplay mechanics including combat and exploration.

  • A selection of enemies,12 bosses, biomes, and basic combat abilities.

  • vampiric slaves you can command after chapter 1

Future updates will expand the narrative, add more regions, deepen the combat system, introduce new abilities, and enhance the game's world based on community feedback.

About Early Access:

Your participation in Early Access helps shape the game's future. We're committed to:

Regular updates based on player feedback.

Expanding content, refining gameplay, and fixing bugs.

Sharing our development journey with you.

Join Aileron in his quest for vengeance and redemption. Wishlist Blood of the Elves now or delve into the darkness today to start your journey back to the light.
